team-text: We are a highly motivated international team that revolutionizes how humanitarian aid is delivered around the world. Our team was motivated by the Venezuelan crisis and the lack of pathways to deliver direct support to people in need of assistance. Yakera’s technology helps us deliver support directly to people’s bank accounts based on a simple belief: people know their own needs better than anyone else; better than we do.
